typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		actloc as string,
		country as string,
		city as string,
		site_name as string,
		site_type as string,
		email_address as string,
		phone as string,
		contact_person as string,
		address_1 as string,
		address_2 as string,
		address_3 as string,
		city_name as string,
		region as string,
		postal_code as string,
		local_tax as decimal(38,18),
		global_tax as decimal(38,18),
		eu_tax as decimal(38,18),
		customer_service as string,
		sales_operations as string,
		cherry_picking_fee as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['validated_vendor_list_v2/*.parquet']) ~> validatedvendorlistv2Stagingdata
source(output(
		maersk_name as string,
		maersk_countrycode as string,
		maersk_countryid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['country/*.parquet']) ~> CountryData
validatedvendorlistv2Stagingdata derive(city = trim(toString(byName('city'))),
		country = upper(trim(toString(byName('country'))))) ~> DataTransformation
SelectRequiredColumns, CountryData lookup(upper(maersk_country) == upper(CountryData@maersk_name),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupCountry
LookupCountry select(mapColumn(
		maersk_citycode,
		maersk_name = SelectRequiredColumns@maersk_name,
		maersk_country = maersk_countryid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectCountry
DataTransformation select(mapColumn(
		maersk_citycode = city,
		maersk_name = city,
		maersk_country = country
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectRequiredColumns
SelectCountry aggregate(groupBy(maersk_citycode),
	each(match(name!='maersk_citycode'), $$ = first($$))) ~> SelectDistinctValues
SelectDistinctValues sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	mapColumn(
		maersk_citycode,
		maersk_name,
		maersk_country
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> IntermediateBlobCity
